list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be entitled to a particular benefit or privilege by fulfilling a necessary condition.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they do not qualify for compensation payments
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ không đủ điều kiện nhận thanh toán bồi thường

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: become officially recognized as a practitioner of a particular profession or activity by satisfying the relevant conditions or requirements, typically by undertaking a course of study and passing examinations.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi chỉ có đủ điều kiện

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (a statement or assertion) less absolute; add reservations to.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she felt obliged to qualify her first short answer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô cảm thấy có nghĩa vụ phải đủ điều kiện câu trả lời ngắn đầu tiên của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a word or phrase) attribute a quality to (another word, especially a preceding noun).
